evidence.claim: Liine utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless compute functions.
Liine offers APIs compliant with FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Their platform supports HL7 interfaces for interoperability with healthcare systems.
Liine is compliant with HIPAA regulations for data security in healthcare.
They integrate with Twilio for communication services.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of specific X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse functionalities.
